KEYWORDS.highly educated people: những người có trình độ học vấn cao
KEYWORDS.a better standard of living: một tiêu chuẩn sống tốt hơn
KEYWORDS.how to tackle this issue?: làm thế nào để giải quyết vấn đề này?

TASK: Brain drain is defined as the migration of highly educated people in search of a better standard of living, quality of life, and higher salaries. Brain drain is a serious problem in some developing countries. What are the causes and how to tackle this issue?
